item.title: Trump’s Dollar Problem
item.description: The last thing that the president needs is for a dollar decline to add more inflationary pressure.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Right to Re-Redesignate the Army Bases
item.description: The Defense Department has acted in accordance with the law, while preserving and honoring American history.

item.title: Peace Through Strength Requires a Strong Defense of Human Rights
item.description: The future of U.S. foreign policy is brightest when we craft and implement policies that effectively advance both U.S. interests and human rights.

item.title: We’re Better Off Loved
item.description: Why are we normalizing killing as health care?

item.title: The Politicization of Everything Didn’t Start with Trump’s Kennedy Center Visit
item.description: Why is the New York Times , of all places, surprised?
